content: * please note that this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free version on my blog www theturtletrunk com * the picot scarf & cowl crochet pattern is full of incredible texture and will be sure to keep you warm this fall and winter it features mini bobble like stitches and ribbed stitches for a fun and beautiful fabric the size can easily be adjusted for any length and width so you can make it the perfect size for you pattern includes - written instructions for 4 sizes child cowl child scarf adult cowl and adult scarf - gauge pattern - link to the free video tutorial - stitch and pattern photos for reference difficulty advanced beginner / easy standard us crochet terms supplies needed medium 4 weight yarn 5 50mm i hook yarn needle & scissors
